content:
From: Florian Haftmann <florian.haftmann@informatik.tu-muenchen.de>
Draft of tutorial on using and customizing the generic SML/Haskell
code generator framework is now available in Isabelle CVS

Doc/IsarAdvanced/Codegen/

or in time as part of the development snapshot

http://isabelle.in.tum.de/devel/Isabelle_08-Nov-2007_pdf.tar.gz

Suggestions welcomed.

Happy hacking
Florian
florian.haftmann.vcf
signature.asc
